query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS configuracoes_duracao (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id INT NOT NULL,
  tipo_compromisso VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  duracao_minutos INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 30,
  local_padrao VARCHAR(100),
  cor VARCHAR(20),
  ativo BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_config_duracao_tenant_tipo (tenant_id, tipo_compromisso),
  FOREIGN KEY (tenant_id) REFERENCES tenants(id)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS configuracoes_duracao (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant_id INT NOT NULL,
  tipo_compromisso VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  duracao_minutos INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 30,
  local_padrao VARCHAR(100),
  cor VARCHAR(20),
  ativo BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_config_duracao_tenant_tipo (tenant_id, tipo_compromisso),
  FOREIGN KEY (tenant_id) REFERENCES tenants(id)
);
